name: Corkscrew
description: Spin during the entry over the glider into a Helicopter

criterias.normal: energy on entry, timing, flow. Stable entry into the Helicopter
criterias.twisted: twisted during the entry, untwisted by the rotation of the cork
criterias.reverse: immediate transition to a Helicopter in the opposite direction
criterias.devil twist: Twisted during the entry, untwisted during the rotation of the cork, re twisted by the connection. Must stay twisted for minimum 2 turns of heli. Can untwist for the exitForbidden connection to helicopter
